author: gawor
msg: ARIES-358: Generate a complete deployment manifest information for applications

author: kwright
msg: Add connection support to API.  This completes the implementation of the LCF 0.5 API.  The API is currently missing support for reports, tests, and documentation.  Tests and documentation will be added in future checkins, and the report portion of the API will be completed at some time in the more distant future.
